alert.note: Alert for Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dawes County through 630 PM MDT... At 542 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Slim Butte, or 14 miles northwest of Chadron, moving southeast at 50 mph. This thunderstorm has a history of producing winds over 50 mph near Hot Springs South Dakota. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chadron Airport around 610 PM MDT. Chadron around 615 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Whitney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
